pages.text: This seed can be found in Jungle Temples and Archaeology sites.$(br)Can also be $(l:hexalia:rituals/ritual_of_transmutation)transmuted$() into $(l:hexalia:rituals/elemental_weapons)Elemental Weapons$().$(br2)Sniffers have a chance to dig up Ancient Seeds.

$(br)$(o)$(#248A8B)'In the past, witches used to grow special weapons using magical seeds; however, this practice was lost in time long ago. Now, remnants of these special weapons remain, and these now dormant seeds could be the key to uncovering ancient magical secrets'
